desc.en: Aris meets with Millennium students who cheer her on, and discusses the Sword of Light with members of the Engineering Department. She enjoys every moment of it. Afterwards, Aris runs into Neru and they visit an arcade to enjoy some video games together. Though they were once enemies against each other, Aris is now proud to declare Neru as her party member.
desc.jp: Aris meets with Millennium students who cheer her on, and discusses the Sword of Light with members of the Engineering Department. She enjoys every moment of it. Afterwards, Aris runs into Neru and they visit an arcade to enjoy some video games together. Though they were once enemies against each other, Aris is now proud to declare Neru as her party member.
desc.thai: Aris meets with Millennium students who cheer her on, and discusses the Sword of Light with members of the Engineering Department. She enjoys every moment of it. Afterwards, Aris runs into Neru and they visit an arcade to enjoy some video games together. Though they were once enemies against each other, Aris is now proud to declare Neru as her party member.
desc.ko: Aris meets with Millennium students who cheer her on, and discusses the Sword of Light with members of the Engineering Department. She enjoys every moment of it. Afterwards, Aris runs into Neru and they visit an arcade to enjoy some video games together. Though they were once enemies against each other, Aris is now proud to declare Neru as her party member.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲和千年的學生們見面後，學生們給予了加油，和工程師部見面後則聊了「光之劍」，度過了愉快的時光。後來愛麗絲遇見寧瑠，兩人一起去遊戲中心開心地玩遊戲。雖然兩人曾經是兵戎相見的關係，但現在愛麗絲也能笑著說寧瑠是自己的同伴。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝和千年的学生们见面后，学生们给予了加油，和工程师部见面后则聊了「光之剑」，度过了愉快的时光。后来爱丽丝遇见尼禄，两人一起去游戏中心开心地玩游戏。虽然两人曾经是兵戎相见的关系，但现在爱丽丝也能笑着说尼禄是自己的同伴。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝和千年的学生们见面后，学生们给予了加油，和工程师部见面后则聊了「光之剑」，度过了愉快的时光。后来爱丽丝遇见宁瑠，两人一起去游戏中心开心地玩游戏。虽然两人曾经是兵戎相见的关系，但现在爱丽丝也能笑着说宁瑠是自己的同伴。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝和千年的学生们见面后，学生们给予了加油，和工程师部见面后则聊了「光之剑」，度过了愉快的时光。后来爱丽丝遇见宁瑠，两人一起去游戏中心开心地玩游戏。虽然两人曾经是兵戎相见的关系，但现在爱丽丝也能笑着说宁瑠是自己的同伴。

desc.en: Aris met other Millennium students at school's square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. They were even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.jp: Aris met other Millennium students at school's square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. They were even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.thai: Aris met other Millennium students at school's square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. They were even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.ko: Aris met other Millennium students at school's square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. They were even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲在千年廣場遇到了其他千年的學生，大家都很高興見到她。中途愛麗絲還收到了幾個支線任務，被以報酬的名義贈送了點心。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝在千年广场遇到了其他千年的学生，大家都很高兴见到她。中途爱丽丝还收到了几个支线任务，被以报酬的名义赠送了点心。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝在千年广场遇到了其他千年的学生，大家都很高兴见到她。中途爱丽丝还收到了几个支线任务，被以报酬的名义赠送了点心。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝在千年广场遇到了其他千年的学生，大家都很高兴见到她。中途爱丽丝还收到了几个支线任务，被以报酬的名义赠送了点心。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.thai: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.ko: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。
desc.zh_tw: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.

desc.en: Aris met the three at Engineering Department. Utaha asked the conditions of the Sword of Light, Aris said that it was kept with her utmost care.
desc.jp: Aris met the three at Engineering Department. Utaha asked the conditions of the Sword of Light, Aris said that it was kept with her utmost care.
desc.thai: Aris met the three at Engineering Department. Utaha asked the conditions of the Sword of Light, Aris said that it was kept with her utmost care.
desc.ko: Aris met the three at Engineering Department. Utaha asked the conditions of the Sword of Light, Aris said that it was kept with her utmost care.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲在校園裡見到了工程部三人，後者表示是出來蒐羅新裝備的。詠葉問愛麗絲光之劍近況如何，愛麗絲則表示在很愛護地使用著。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝在校园里见到了工程部三人，后者表示是出来搜罗新装备的。歌原问爱丽丝光之剑近况如何，爱丽丝则表示在很爱护地使用着。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝在校园里见到了工程部三人，后者表示是出来搜罗新装备的。咏叶问爱丽丝光之剑近况如何，爱丽丝则表示在很爱护地使用着。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝在校园里见到了工程部三人，后者表示是出来搜罗新装备的。咏叶问爱丽丝光之剑近况如何，爱丽丝则表示在很爱护地使用着。

desc.en: Aris met more people at other places, until she saw a familar figure at the subway.
desc.jp: Aris met more people at other places, until she saw a familar figure at the subway.
desc.thai: Aris met more people at other places, until she saw a familar figure at the subway.
desc.ko: Aris met more people at other places, until she saw a familar figure at the subway.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲在更多地方見到了更多的人，直到在車站遇見了一個熟悉的身影。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝在更多地方见到了更多的人，直到在车站遇见了一个熟悉的身影。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝在更多地方见到了更多的人，直到在车站遇见了一个熟悉的身影。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝在更多地方见到了更多的人，直到在车站遇见了一个熟悉的身影。

desc.en: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.
desc.jp: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.
desc.thai: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.
desc.ko: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲叫寧瑠“小不點”讓後者頗為不滿，但還是拽著老師和愛麗絲到了遊戲廳。不出所料，寧瑠不斷輸給了愛麗絲，儘管愛麗絲已經教了她相當一段時間。寧瑠雖然非常惱火愛麗絲評價她的水平不好，但還是請教愛麗絲連招的操作。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝叫尼禄“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和爱丽丝到了游戏厅。不出所料，尼禄不断输给了爱丽丝，尽管爱丽丝已经教了她相当一段时间。尼禄虽然非常恼火爱丽丝评价她的水平不好，但还是请教爱丽丝连招的操作。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝叫宁瑠“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和爱丽丝到了游戏厅。不出所料，宁瑠不断输给了爱丽丝，尽管爱丽丝已经教了她相当一段时间。宁瑠虽然非常恼火爱丽丝评价她的水平不好，但还是请教爱丽丝连招的操作。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝叫宁瑠“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和爱丽丝到了游戏厅。不出所料，宁瑠不断输给了爱丽丝，尽管爱丽丝已经教了她相当一段时间。宁瑠虽然非常恼火爱丽丝评价她的水平不好，但还是请教爱丽丝连招的操作。

desc.jp: neru aris arcade game store shop indoor artificial light room
desc.thai: neru aris arcade game store shop indoor artificial light room
desc.ko: neru aris arcade game store shop indoor artificial light room

desc.en: Aris started teaching uneasily. Neru, while cursing, restarted the game again and again, but remained unsuccessful after a long time. Then, Akane came.
desc.jp: Aris started teaching uneasily. Neru, while cursing, restarted the game again and again, but remained unsuccessful after a long time. Then, Akane came.
desc.thai: Aris started teaching uneasily. Neru, while cursing, restarted the game again and again, but remained unsuccessful after a long time. Then, Akane came.
desc.ko: Aris started teaching uneasily. Neru, while cursing, restarted the game again and again, but remained unsuccessful after a long time. Then, Akane came.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲有些不安地開始了教學。寧瑠一邊罵著一邊不服氣地重新開始一次次戰局，但即便過了很久還是沒成。這時，朱音來了。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝有些不安地开始了教学。尼禄一边骂着一边不服气地重新开始一次次战局，但即便过了很久还是没成。这时，茜来了。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝有些不安地开始了教学。宁瑠一边骂着一边不服气地重新开始一次次战局，但即便过了很久还是没成。这时，朱音来了。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝有些不安地开始了教学。宁瑠一边骂着一边不服气地重新开始一次次战局，但即便过了很久还是没成。这时，朱音来了。

ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Though still pretty upset, Neru was dragged by Akane and forced to leave. Akane also mentioned about the mission assigned by Rio.
desc.jp: Though still pretty upset, Neru was dragged by Akane and forced to leave. Akane also mentioned about the mission assigned by Rio.
desc.thai: Though still pretty upset, Neru was dragged by Akane and forced to leave. Akane also mentioned about the mission assigned by Rio.
desc.ko: Though still pretty upset, Neru was dragged by Akane and forced to leave. Akane also mentioned about the mission assigned by Rio.
desc.zh_tw: 雖然寧瑠仍然很不服氣，但朱音還是強行把寧瑠給拖走了，並且還提到了莉央所下達的任務。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 虽然尼禄仍然很不服气，但茜还是强行把尼禄给拖走了，并且还提到了莉央所下达的任务。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 虽然宁瑠仍然很不服气，但朱音还是强行把宁瑠给拖走了，并且还提到了莉央所下达的任务。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 虽然宁瑠仍然很不服气，但朱音还是强行把宁瑠给拖走了，并且还提到了莉央所下达的任务。

desc.en: Sensei was surprised to see that Aris wasn't afraid of Neru. Sensei was glad to get to know Aris' daily life. Though Aris didn't complete Yuzu's assignment, Aris still felt happy. And she said that a hero will not give up easily.
desc.jp: Sensei was surprised to see that Aris wasn't afraid of Neru. Sensei was glad to get to know Aris' daily life. Though Aris didn't complete Yuzu's assignment, Aris still felt happy. And she said that a hero will not give up easily.
desc.thai: Sensei was surprised to see that Aris wasn't afraid of Neru. Sensei was glad to get to know Aris' daily life. Though Aris didn't complete Yuzu's assignment, Aris still felt happy. And she said that a hero will not give up easily.
desc.ko: Sensei was surprised to see that Aris wasn't afraid of Neru. Sensei was glad to get to know Aris' daily life. Though Aris didn't complete Yuzu's assignment, Aris still felt happy. And she said that a hero will not give up easily.
desc.zh_tw: 老師對愛麗絲居然不害怕寧瑠感到驚訝，而愛麗絲則表示是因為寧瑠現在已經是個夥伴了。老師對能瞭解愛麗絲的生活感到開心。雖然沒能完成柚子佈置的任務，但愛麗絲還是很開心，並且表示勇者是不會輕易放棄的。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师对爱丽丝居然不害怕尼禄感到惊讶，而爱丽丝则表示是因为尼禄现在已经是个伙伴了。老师对能了解爱丽丝的生活感到开心。虽然没能完成柚子布置的任务，但爱丽丝还是很开心，并且表示勇者是不会轻易放弃的。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师对爱丽丝居然不害怕宁瑠感到惊讶，而爱丽丝则表示是因为宁瑠现在已经是个伙伴了。老师对能了解爱丽丝的生活感到开心。虽然没能完成柚子布置的任务，但爱丽丝还是很开心，并且表示勇者是不会轻易放弃的。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师对爱丽丝居然不害怕宁瑠感到惊讶，而爱丽丝则表示是因为宁瑠现在已经是个伙伴了。老师对能了解爱丽丝的生活感到开心。虽然没能完成柚子布置的任务，但爱丽丝还是很开心，并且表示勇者是不会轻易放弃的。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.thai: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.ko: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。
desc.zh_tw: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.jp: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.thai: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.ko: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.zh_tw: 事情告一段落。莉央消失不見，C&C則迎接新成員，遊戲開發部再次開始研發下一部作品。千年再次恢復和平的日常生活。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 事情告一段落。莉央消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，游戏开发部再次开始研发下一部作品。千年再次恢复和平的日常生活。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 事情告一段落。莉央消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，游戏开发部再次开始研发下一部作品。千年再次恢复和平的日常生活。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 事情告一段落。莉央消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，游戏开发部再次开始研发下一部作品。千年再次恢复和平的日常生活。

desc.en: Himari said that the Eridu City had been sealed and the things afterwards would be handled by her.
desc.jp: Himari said that the Eridu City had been sealed and the things afterwards would be handled by her.
desc.thai: Himari said that the Eridu City had been sealed and the things afterwards would be handled by her.
desc.ko: Himari said that the Eridu City had been sealed and the things afterwards would be handled by her.
desc.zh_tw: 陽葵向老師表示，Eridu已經封存，後事將由她進行負責。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠向老师表示，Eridu已经封存，后事将由她进行负责。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵向老师表示，Eridu已经封存，后事将由她进行负责。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 阳葵向老师表示，Eridu已经封存，后事将由她进行负责。

hobby.zh_tw: 確認今天的運勢、所有的神秘事物
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 确认今天的运势、所有的神秘事物

desc.en: Rio decided to step down as the president after this incident. Though in great shock, Yuuka could only find a note left by the President, with "I'm sorry" on it.
desc.jp: Rio decided to step down as the president after this incident. Though in great shock, Yuuka could only find a note left by the President, with "I'm sorry" on it.
desc.thai: Rio decided to step down as the president after this incident. Though in great shock, Yuuka could only find a note left by the President, with "I'm sorry" on it.
desc.ko: Rio decided to step down as the president after this incident. Though in great shock, Yuuka could only find a note left by the President, with "I'm sorry" on it.
desc.zh_tw: 莉央在此事後決定卸任會長一職，優香大為震撼。會長走前只留下了一條“對不起”的紙條。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央在此事后决定卸任会长一职，优香大为震撼。会长走前只留下了一条“对不起”的纸条。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉央在此事后决定卸任会长一职，优香大为震撼。会长走前只留下了一条“对不起”的纸条。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央在此事后决定卸任会长一职，优香大为震撼。会长走前只留下了一条“对不起”的纸条。

ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: C&C invited Sensei to the party to celebrate the recovery of the president Neru. Asuna purposed the idea of "Bunny Suit". As the president disappeared, Toki attended the party and became a member of C&C.
desc.jp: C&C invited Sensei to the party to celebrate the recovery of the president Neru. Asuna purposed the idea of "Bunny Suit". As the president disappeared, Toki attended the party and became a member of C&C.
desc.thai: C&C invited Sensei to the party to celebrate the recovery of the president Neru. Asuna purposed the idea of "Bunny Suit". As the president disappeared, Toki attended the party and became a member of C&C.
desc.ko: C&C invited Sensei to the party to celebrate the recovery of the president Neru. Asuna purposed the idea of "Bunny Suit". As the president disappeared, Toki attended the party and became a member of C&C.
desc.zh_tw: C&C邀請了老師前來參加聚會，慶祝部長寧瑠康復出院。明日奈提出了兔女郎裝的主意。季因為會長失蹤，所以也來參加了聚會，併成為C&C的一員。
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C邀请了老师前来参加聚会，庆祝部长尼禄康复出院。明日奈提出了兔女郎装的主意。时因为会长失踪，所以也来参加了聚会，并成为C&C的一员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C邀请了老师前来参加聚会，庆祝部长宁瑠康复出院。明日奈提出了兔女郎装的主意。季因为会长失踪，所以也来参加了聚会，并成为C&C的一员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C邀请了老师前来参加聚会，庆祝部长宁瑠康复出院。明日奈提出了兔女郎装的主意。季因为会长失踪，所以也来参加了聚会，并成为C&C的一员。

realname.zh_cn: 机械迷林(High-Tech Full On Mix)

desc.en: The Engineering Department were developing new stuff as always. Veritas were working closely with Super Phenomenon Task Force. Sumire resumed her daily exercises.
desc.jp: The Engineering Department were developing new stuff as always. Veritas were working closely with Super Phenomenon Task Force. Sumire resumed her daily exercises.
desc.thai: The Engineering Department were developing new stuff as always. Veritas were working closely with Super Phenomenon Task Force. Sumire resumed her daily exercises.
desc.ko: The Engineering Department were developing new stuff as always. Veritas were working closely with Super Phenomenon Task Force. Sumire resumed her daily exercises.
desc.zh_tw: 工程部一如既往的開發著新東西。貝里塔斯和特異現象搜查部一起工作。堇也恢復了日常的鍛鍊。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 工程部一如既往的开发着新东西。贝里塔斯和特异现象搜查部一起工作。堇也恢复了日常的锻炼。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 工程部一如既往的开发着新东西。贝里塔斯和特异现象搜查部一起工作。堇也恢复了日常的锻炼。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 工程部一如既往的开发着新东西。贝里塔斯和特异现象搜查部一起工作。堇也恢复了日常的锻炼。

realname.zh_cn: 机械迷林(High-Tech Full On Mix)

desc.en: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story went on and on.
desc.jp: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story went on and on.
desc.thai: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story went on and on.
desc.ko: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story went on and on.
desc.zh_tw: 老師被叫到了遊戲開發部，眾人表示老師正在開發一款新的遊戲，因為之前的那個無法繼續擴充套件思路。愛麗絲邀請老師一起嘗試，眾人在愉快的氛圍下開始了遊戲。故事仍在續寫中。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师被叫到了游戏开发部，众人表示老师正在开发一款新的游戏，因为之前的那个无法继续扩展思路。爱丽丝邀请老师一起尝试，众人在愉快的氛围下开始了游戏。故事仍在续写中。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师被叫到了游戏开发部，众人表示老师正在开发一款新的游戏，因为之前的那个无法继续扩展思路。爱丽丝邀请老师一起尝试，众人在愉快的氛围下开始了游戏。故事仍在续写中。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师被叫到了游戏开发部，众人表示老师正在开发一款新的游戏，因为之前的那个无法继续扩展思路。爱丽丝邀请老师一起尝试，众人在愉快的氛围下开始了游戏。故事仍在续写中。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.thai: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.ko: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。
desc.zh_tw: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en: [An MV is playing in this part. The BGM was the ending song for the short animation firm "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department. Considering that most images in the videos are actually a part of the in-game backgrounds, therefore we'll be listing as much as backgrounds as we can.]
desc.jp: [An MV is playing in this part. The BGM was the ending song for the short animation firm "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department. Considering that most images in the videos are actually a part of the in-game backgrounds, therefore we'll be listing as much as backgrounds as we can.]
desc.thai: [An MV is playing in this part. The BGM was the ending song for the short animation firm "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department. Considering that most images in the videos are actually a part of the in-game backgrounds, therefore we'll be listing as much as backgrounds as we can.]
desc.ko: [An MV is playing in this part. The BGM was the ending song for the short animation firm "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department. Considering that most images in the videos are actually a part of the in-game backgrounds, therefore we'll be listing as much as backgrounds as we can.]
desc.zh_tw: 【此處為過場影片播放，背景音樂為遊戲部短篇動畫《beautiful day dreamer》的片尾曲。由於影片中的圖片素材大多在遊戲記憶體在，因而背景一欄將盡量給出具體的圖片】
desc.zh_cn_jp: 【此处为过场视频播放，背景音乐为游戏部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》的片尾曲。由于视频中的图片素材大多在游戏内存在，因而背景一栏将尽量给出具体的图片】
desc.zh_cn_tw: 【此处为过场视频播放，背景音乐为游戏部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》的片尾曲。由于视频中的图片素材大多在游戏内存在，因而背景一栏将尽量给出具体的图片】
desc.zh_cn_cn: 【此处为过场视频播放，背景音乐为游戏部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》的片尾曲。由于视频中的图片素材大多在游戏内存在，因而背景一栏将尽量给出具体的图片】

desc.en: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.jp: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.thai: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.

The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.zh_cn: 官方游戏开发部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》中的片尾曲，由游戏开发部四人演唱。该歌曲由两分钟及四分钟两个版本，其中前者用于动画末尾曲与游戏内第二篇第二章的结尾曲。
desc.zh_tw: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
